channel.title: I need help with a 317 please
channel.description: hi im new to the rsps community and i know im a noob so please dont bother telling me. my problem is im using the combattscaoe source created by bounty leader for my server and all and changed the name then i used the client and im about 95% sure i changed all the ips and everything in the client.java,frame_sub1.java and the Egui.java to my server name and ip but then i compress it and send it to my laptop to see if the client works and all and it keeps on saying error connecting to server but the webcleints will connect. i have portfowarded and everything so thats not the problem. so if you could help me please let me know something and it will be EXTREMELY appreciated. Thank you
